details: Schema: FUSION Object owner: FAI Object type: VIEW
sql_query:
SELECT
b.DEEP_LINK_ID DEEP_LINK_ID,
b.DEEP_LINK_CODE DEEP_LINK_CODE,
b.USAGE_TYPE USAGE_TYPE,
b.DESTINATION_URL DESTINATION_URL,
b.DEEP_LINK_PROPERTIES DEEP_LINK_PROPERTIES,
b.FAMILY FAMILY,
b.PRODUCT PRODUCT,
b.CREATED_BY CREATED_BY,
b.CREATION_DATE CREATION_DATE,
b.LAST_UPDATED_BY LAST_UPDATED_BY,
b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
b.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN,
b.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER,
b.MODULE_ID MODULE_ID,
tl.NAME NAME,
tl.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION,
tl.MESSAGE MESSAGE
FROM
FAI_DEEP_LINKS_B b,
FAI_DEEP_LINKS_TL tl
WHERE
b.DEEP_LINK_ID = tl.DEEP_LINK_ID AND tl.LANGUAGE = USERENV('LANG')
